---
title: "COP27 Presentation - SDG 15 & Soapstone Bison"
---

This story map covers a case study of Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) 15, focusing on the Soapstone Bison reintroduction in Northern Colorado. I had the pleasure of presenting our case study for the YEAH Network in Sharm El- Sheikh, Egypt in front of global leaders to address climate impacts.

> SDG 15 is Life on Land
